qas.question: What is the name of the art museum in Detroit?
What is the name of the Detroit museum of African American history?

answers.text: Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History

qas.question: Where was the birthplace of the Model T?

context: Many of the area's prominent museums are located in the historic cultural center neighborhood around Wayne State University and the College for Creative Studies. These museums include the <a0_0>Detroit Institute of Arts<a0_0/>, the Detroit Historical Museum, <a1_0>Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History<a1_0/>, the Detroit Science Center, as well as the main branch of the Detroit Public Library. Other cultural highlights include Motown Historical Museum, the <a2_0>Ford Piquette Avenue Plant<a2_0/> museum (birthplace of the Ford Model T and the world's oldest car factory building open to the public), the Pewabic Pottery studio and school, the Tuskegee Airmen Museum, Fort Wayne, the Dossin Great Lakes Museum, the <a3_0>Museum of Contemporary Art Detroit<a3_0/> (MOCAD), the <a4_0>Contemporary Art Institute of Detroit<a4_0/> (CAID), and the Belle Isle Conservatory.
